Package alix.lucene.analysis

Components for lexical analysis, especially for French.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Compound
    A mutable String used to merge compunds words.
    FrAnalyzer
    Analysis scenario for French in Alix.
    FrDics
    Preloaded word List for lucene indexation in HashMap.
    FrDics.LexEntry  
    FrDics.NameEntry  
    FrTokenizer
    A Lucene tokenizer for XML/html (and French).
    FrTokenLem
    A lucene token filter adding other channels to the token stream an orthographic form (normalized) in a CharsOrthAtt a lemma in a CharsLemAtt a pos as a lucene int flag FlagsAttribute (according to the semantic of Tag
    MetaAnalyzer  
    MetaTokenizer  
    TokenCompound
    Plug behind TokenLem
    TokenFlagFilter
    A token Filter selecting tokens by flag values.
    TokenLemCloud
    A final token filter before indexation, to plug after a lemmatizer filter, providing most significant tokens for word cloud.
    TokenLemFull
    A token Filter to plug after a TokenLem filter, overriding positions with lemma and POS
    TokenStats
    A token filter counting tokens.
